Name: Prison Architect
Overview: Take control of the building and running of a maximum security prison as the critically acclaimed lock-em-up arrives on Xbox 360! Your Design, Their Fate Will you build and manage a prison to create social order where itâ€™s failed in the past, offering rehabilitation and peaceful coexistence amongst inmates? Will your prison disregard human rights, impose intentional harshness and be devoid of any notions of wellbeing and freedom? The choice is yours.
